channel.title: Projects on Artur L Gower
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Artur L Gower

item.title: Wave Software
item.description: Software for wave propagation and scattering.

item.title: Surface waves and instabilities
item.description: Surface waves and wrinkles can be used to characterise the underlying soft solid.

item.title: Entropy GO
item.description: Use AI concepts, such as entropy maximisation, to play games.

item.title: Waves in Complex Materials
item.description: The aim is to understand how waves (like sound, radio, light, and vibrations) behave in materials with random microstructure.

item.title: Industrial Mathematics
item.description: Combining maths, data and code to solve commercial and industrial problems.

item.title: The mechanics of soft solids
item.description: How do we mathematically describe the stresses and deformation of anisotropic soft solids.
